Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: 'So, the ARU used the refugees that survived the riots as test subjects for humanoid-hybrid modification experiments.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not to mention, they concealed the truth under the guise of normal Construct modifications given to seriously ill refugees that signed up voluntarily.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What a... cruel... heartless thing to do...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Whether it was Amberia or any of the others... They just wanted to live.', 4: '1'}
